optimizations module¶

class optimizations.Adam(learning_rate, beta1=0.9, beta2=0.999, epsilon=1e-08)¶

Bases: object

Optimizer that implements the Adam algorithm.

initialize(parameters)¶

Initializes the v and s for Adam optimizer.

Args:

parameters: dictionary of the parameters.

update_parameters(parameters, grads)¶

Updates parameters using Adam.

Args:

parameters: dictionary of the parameters. grads: dictionary contains the gradients of the parameters.

Returns:

dictionary of the updated parameters.

class optimizations.GradientDescent(learning_rate)¶

Bases: object

Gradient descent optimizer.

static initialize(parameters)¶
update_parameters(parameters, grads)¶

Updates parameters using gradient descent.

Args:

parameters: dictionary of the parameters. grads: dictionary contains the gradients of the parameters.

Returns:

dictionary of the updated parameters.

class optimizations.Momentum(learning_rate, beta=0.9)¶

Bases: object

Gradient descent (with momentum) optimizer.

initialize(parameters)¶

Initializes the velocity.

Args:

parameters: dictionary of the parameters.

update_parameters(parameters, grads)¶

Updates parameters using gradient descent (with momentum).

Args:

parameters: dictionary of the parameters. grads: dictionary contains the gradients of the parameters.

Returns:

dictionary of the updated parameters.
